pages.text: $(li)The End Crystal Ingot is the hardest material that you can obtain in this World.$(br)$(li)It can be used to craft multiple tools and even an armor in the Smithing Table.

pages.title: End Crystal Crafts
pages.text: $(li)End Crystal Axe$(li)End Crystal Sword$(li)End Crystal Shovel$(li)End Crystal Hoe$(li)End Crystal Pickaxe$(li)End Crystal Armor
